div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1842 Hazara district, Pakistan, 1833 (483) Burial: 2nd cent. B.C. (Le Rider) Contents: 120 AR Menander: 108 dr. Apollodotus I: 7 dr. (square) Antimachus II: 5 dr. Disposition: C. Masson Masson, JASB 1836, pp. 1-28, illus. Prinsep, Essays on Indian Antiquities 1 (London, 1858), p. 348
